description:
Vince Venturella and I made a new 'zine! Check out SNARL 2024 with the new microgame "The Great Goblin Argle-Bargle" and three add-ons to some of our previous games: http://www.snarlingbadger.com

I'm a member of The Army Painter Factory Team - and I'm passing the savings on to you! Use code 'FactoryUncle5' at checkout to get 5% off of your entire order at http://www.thearmypainter.com or check my favorite Army Painter products at https://thearmypainter.com/blogs/landing-pages/tabletop-minions-top-picks?utm_source=sponsorship&utm_medium=video&utm_campaign=tabletop-minions

I'm now a partner on Twitch! I paint minis every Friday morning and Monday night, and sometimes take paint breaks (play video games poorly). Follow me: http://www.twitch.tv/tabletopminions

Official Tabletop Minions t-shirts: http://bit.ly/merchbunker

Help support the channel on Patreon, and get access to the Discord: http://www.patreon.com/tabletopminions

Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/tabletopminions
Instagram
title: New Goblin Game and THREE New Add-Ons - SNARL 2024 'Zine
